thread.section_title: Store DJ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Store DJ | storedj.com.au
thread.title: Joe Millman
thread.title_full: Store DJ reviewed by Joe Millman

author: Joe Millman
title: Joe Millman
text: More than anything, I value customer service. Ahead of price, product stock levels, product knowledge, expertise etc. Customer service in my opinion trumps them all. The first thing I noticed at StoreDJ was the great customer service. This sold me on buying with them even before they Quote: d me the excellent price on the quality products I required. Not only was their customer service top notch, their price turned out to be 10% better than their nearest competiton. I have no reservations in recommending this retailer and will be shopping with them again soon.
